Grove Collaborative Customer Service Phone Number (844) 476-8375, Email, Help Center Skip to content PissedConsumer Reviews Categories All Categories Media Auctions and Marketplaces E-commerce Food Delivery Footwear and Clothing Gambling and Lotto Transportation and Logistics Companies All Companies Amazon Meesho Temu Google KukuFM YouTube TV Blinkit Write review For Business Login Household Essentials Grove Collaborative 80 Customer Service Updated on 08/26/2025 Contact Grove Collaborative Customer Service Reviews 0 Contacts Community Advertisements Grove Collaborative Phone Numbers and Emails Toll-Free Number: (844) 476-8375 Call customer service Legal: (800) 952-5210 California Department of Consumer Affairs Grove Collaborative Emails: support@grove.co dataprivacy@grove.co GDPR Inquiries legal@grove.co community@grove.co Is this your business? phone numbers and emails Advertisements Grove Collaborative Customer Service Overview The aggregated data is based on calls made from PissedConsumer.com website and questionnaires provided by PissedConsumer.com users. Grove Collaborative Customer Service is rated at 2.4 out of 5 . Consumers who contact the company are mostly dissatisfied . More commonly used way of contact is by phone . Source Distribution 84% phone 16% email The best phone number to call Grove Collaborative is 8444768375 . 94% of consumers used this number to address their issues and concerns. The average hold time is less than 1 minute . The longest wait times are on Tuesday , while the shortest are on Sunday . The average call time is 2 minutes . Be prepared for the call as Grove Collaborative may ask you for the following information to identify you as a customer: email or first and last name . View full overview â€º Grove Collaborative Overview The aggregated data is based on calls made from PissedConsumer.com website and questionnaires provided by PissedConsumer.com users. Grove Collaborative Customer Service is rated at 2.4 out of 5 . Consumers who contact the company are mostly dissatisfied . More commonly used way of contact is by phone . Source Distribution 84% phone 16% email The best phone number to call Grove Collaborative is 8444768375 . 94% of consumers used this number to address their issues and concerns. The average hold time is less than 1 minute . The longest wait times are on Tuesday , while the shortest are on Sunday . The average call time is 2 minutes . Be prepared for the call as Grove Collaborative may ask you for the following information to identify you as a customer: email or first and last name . People call Grove Collaborative mainly because of account, product/ service, shipping and delivery . 15% of the consumers who called the companyâ€™s customer support stated that their issues were resolved. Most customers feel very satisfied after talking to customer service representatives. The best email to contact Grove Collaborative is support@grove.co . 85% of customers use this email address to address their issues and concerns. Customers evaluated the effort they needed to make to contact customer service as easy . Close How to Contact Grove Collaborative? Most Popular Number: (844) 476-8375 Total calls: 256 Issues resolved: 18 Last call: Sep 11, 2025 Winnie Murugi PissedConsumer Reporter Where Is Grove Collaborative Located? The Grove Collaborative headquarters address is Grove Collaborative, Inc., 1301 Sansome Street, San Francisco, CA 94111, United States. You can send an information request to this address to learn more about the company and its products. You can also mail official documentation to this office for the companyâ€™s representatives to handle. The same Grove Collaborative address can be used to contact the Data Protection Officer on the Privacy Policy inquiries. The customer service agents are also ready to answer your questions or help you solve your issues via mail. If you are interested in a partnership with the company, you can reach the Investor Relations Department to discuss the details. What Is The Grove Collaborative Phone Number? The Grove customer service number is 1-844-476-8375. The customer care advisors at this helpline are ready to answer your questions about the companyâ€™s products, provide information about the ingredients, quality, and price, and inform you about special offers and sales. You can also call this Grove Collaborative phone number to request assistance choosing the product for your needs. If you experience difficulties navigating the website, report the problem to the support representative at this phone line. The same number can be used to discuss returns should you have issues with the purchase. You can reach the Data Protection Officer at this helpline as well for questions regarding the Privacy Policy. Can I Email Grove Collaborative Customer Service? You can email Grove Collaborative customer service for general inquiries at support@grove.co. If you want to file a complaint or share your concerns or suggestions with the customer care team, email them to this address. The same contact can be used for the accessibility feedback. Alternatively, you can visit the Grove Contact Us page to email the Help Center using the online form. The Data Protection request can be sent to dataprivacy@grove.co. If you believe the company might have received personal information from a child under 16, report the issue to legal@grove.co. For media inquiries, contact the PR team at community@grove.co. The Investor Relations department is available at IR@grove.co. What Are The Grove Collaborative Contact Hours? The Grove Collaborative hours for phone support are daily between 7 a.m. and midnight ET. You can call the customer care team for general questions and assistance with your issues within these hours, and the helpline operators will provide the required information and find ways to resolve the problem. If you prefer online communication to phone calls, you can contact the live Grove customer service agents via chat during the same business hours. You can also email your inquiry or complete an online form on the Contact Us page whenever convenient, and the Help Center representative will respond as soon as they study your request. Contact Information Grove Collaborative Website: www.grove.co Grove Collaborative Help Center: Visit contact page Corporate Office Address: Grove Collaborative, Inc. 1301 Sansome Str San Francisco, California 94111 United States Help in Social Networks: Facebook Pinterest Instagram Twitter Linkedin Youtube Other Info (opening hours): Hours: 7 days a week: 7 AM - 12 AM (midnight) Eastern Mailing Address: California Department of Consumer Affairs 400 R Street, Sacramento, CA 95814 Other Location: 1190 Trademark Dr, Reno, Nevada 89521 1000 Premier Pkwy S, St Peters, Missouri 63376 110 Corcoran Street, Durham, NC 27701 35 Conewago Road, Elizabethtown, PA 17022 123 Middle St, Portland, Maine 04101 More contact details Fax: +1 (650) 667 7418 Grove Collaborative Customer Service Reviews 2.4 / 5 Poor See all 80 reviews Arlan Fvt Jul 17, 2025 NO SUCCESS. WRONG ORDER AGAIN 1.0 I just received the WRONG order AGAIN. Customer service sucks. No real person who can solve the problem Service wants a review, then sends verifying number through ANOTHER email, which causes me to lose connection. BOO!!! Read full review Patricia F Taj Apr 17, 2025 I lost the person In was speaking to. Instead of trying again to get problem resolved. I tried getting back on Grove site to place order. I was able to do so quickly. 5.0 I would much rather actually speak to a person instead of having to type everything out. I am not the fastest typer and it is just so aggravating to not be able to speak to someone! Read full review Annastacia Zev Apr 8, 2025 Missing Item 1.0 I ordered from Grove Collaborative and was really excited. Once my order arrived, it was missing an item I'd already been charged for. There was no information about the missing item. They didn't email to say the item was out of stock, just left it to me to try to contact them. No one answered the phone and they said I'd hear back in about a week. I emailed through their website and someone did respond, but they did not credit me back the money to my credit card, they put it on account with Grove. Forcing me to shop there again. Additionally, when I said I didn't want a credit, I wanted a refund, they stopped answering my emails. Awful customer service. I'm going to look for another site for my shopping. Read full review Judith P Iou Oct 18, 2024 Difficulty Canceling The company makes it somewhat difficult to cancel the subscription as instructions on how to do are not prominent on the website and requires a separate email. Read full review How Good is Grove Collaborative's Customer Service? Kameisha Kce Kameisha Kce Feels Satisfied | May 30, 2025 very good Read full quote Kiet Jzg Kiet Jzg Feels Satisfied | Apr 11, 2025 Very friendly agent and will see if package gets delivered to correct current address Read full quote Emaan Hvl Emaan Hvl Feels Disappointed | Mar 26, 2025 Pissed consumer is pointless When I have contacted grove directly, it was always resolved quickly and competently Read full quote Allison A Lcb Allison A Lcb Feels Disappointed | Mar 07, 2025 I didnâ€™t have any experience with Grove collaborative. When I called, no one answered it went straight to voicemail so I hung up. I do love their products and hope that someone will contact me to talk further about the issue that I have. My phone number is 917697-**** if someone does wish to call me Read full quote Summary of Grove Collaborative Customer Service Calls 271 TOTAL CALLS 01:42 AVG CALL DURATION 15% ISSUES RESOLVED Top Reasons of Customers Calls Consumers Call the Most From Why Do People Call Grove Collaborative? Account Question: 1M ago â€œHacked accountâ€ 1M ago â€œMy account was hijacked and deleting and reinstalling app did not workâ€ 2M ago â€œSubscriptionâ€ Product/ Service Question: 1M ago â€œProblem with a orderâ€ 1M ago â€œFlush not workingâ€ 3M ago â€œProblem with orderâ€ Shipping and Delivery Question: 2M ago â€œWrong order!â€ 3M ago â€œOrder Placed Asking About Delivery Timeâ€ 3M ago â€œOrder not receivedâ€ Activation/ Cancellation Question: 16d ago â€œCancel subscriptionâ€ 2M ago â€œCancellationâ€ 3M ago â€œCancel todayâ€™s orderâ€ Payments and Charges Question: 1M ago â€œBilling problemâ€ 1M ago â€œThe company tried to charge an order today when on your website, I changed my order to be charged on July 30th, 2025.â€ 3M ago â€œUnauthorized charge for $32.46 that was never ordered.â€ Request for Information Question: 1M ago â€œI need to speak with a representativeâ€ 4M ago â€œChecking application status.â€ 4M ago â€œTo talk to customer service representativeâ€ Return/ Replace Question: 3M ago â€œOrder is returning to wardhouseâ€ 4M ago â€œReturnâ€ 4M ago â€œChange email addressâ€ Refund Question: 5M ago â€œRefundâ€ Staff Question: 1Y ago â€œCustomer serviceâ€ 3Y ago â€œSince 10 years we are satisfied with Grove's customer service.â€ Cards Question: 2Y ago â€œYou have wrong card # on fileâ€ Website/ Application Question: 3Y ago â€œToilet paper website is not giving option for 4 roll pack and I was informed that 8 roll pack is not in stockâ€ Other Question: 1M ago â€œSaid welcome 20% off, told me not available??? Spent 45 mins picking out what I needed! Not happy!!â€ 2M ago â€œOrder pizza pressingâ€ 2M ago â€œOrder mistakeâ€ Compare Grove Collaborative Customer Service To Companies are selected automatically by the algorithm. A company's rating is calculated using a mathematical algorithm that evaluates the information in your profile. The algorithm parameters are: user's rating, number of resolved issues, number of company's responses etc. The algorithm is subject to change in future. ) Contact Us | Get In Touch | The Grove We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits. By clicking â€œAcceptâ€, you consent to the use of ALL the cookies. View Options Accept All Close Cookie Preferences This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these cookies, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may have an effect on your browsing experience. View More Show Less View our Cookie Policy Accept All Strictly Necessary Always Enabled We use necessary cookies to ensure our website works properly and provide essential functionalities and security features. These cookies do not collect any personal information and are always enabled. By continuing to use our website, you agree to our use of these cookies. Cookie sa-user-id-v3 Duration Description no_match Vendor Privacy Policy Cookie sa-user-id-v2 Duration Description no_match Vendor Privacy Policy Cookie up-cookie-consent-options Duration 1 year Description This cookie stores user consent preferences when they visit the site. Vendor UP Cookie Consent Privacy Policy https://uphotel.agency/cookie-policy/ Cookie up-cookie-consent Duration 1 year Description This cookie is used to see if the current user has interacted with the consent manager. Vendor UP Cookie Consent Privacy Policy https://uphotel.agency/cookie-policy/ Cookie sa-user-id Duration Description no_match Vendor Privacy Policy V:8 - 2024-08-12 03:40:14pm Functional Disabled Enabled Functional cookies enable specific functionalities such as social media sharing, feedback collection, and other third-party features. These cookies may collect anonymous data to improve user experience. V:8 - 2024-08-12 03:40:14pm Performance and Analytics Disabled Enabled To enhance user experience, we use performance and analytical cookies to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of our website. Performance cookies help us deliver better user experiences by tracking metrics such as load times and response times. Analytical cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by providing information on metrics like the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, and more. Cookie _clck Duration 1 year Description This cookie is installed by Microsoft Clarity to store information of how visitors use a website and help in creating an analytics report of how the website is doing. The data collected including the number visitors, the source where they have come from, and the pages visited in an anonymous form. Vendor Microsoft Privacy Policy https://account.microsoft.com/privacy Cookie _gcl_au Duration 3 months Description Used by Google AdSense for experimenting with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services. Vendor Google Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacy Cookie _uetvid Duration 16 days Description This is a cookie utilised by Microsoft Bing Ads and is a tracking cookie. It allows us to engage with a user that has previously visited our website. Vendor Bing / Microsoft Privacy Policy https://account.microsoft.com/privacy Cookie _hjSession_*ID* Duration 30 minutes Description A cookie that holds the current session data. This ensues that subsequent requests within the session window will be attributed to the same Hotjar session. Vendor Hotjar Privacy Policy https://www.hotjar.com/legal/policies/privacy/ Cookie _tt_enable_cookie Duration 389 days Description Tracking cookie used by TikTok to identify a visitor Vendor TikTok Privacy Policy https://www.tiktok.com/legal/page/eea/privacy-policy/en?lang=en Cookie _hjSessionUser_*ID* Duration 365 days Description Hotjar cookie that is set when a user first lands on a page with the Hotjar script. It is used to persist the Hotjar User ID, unique to that site on the browser. This ensures that behavior in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID. Vendor Hotjar Privacy Policy https://www.hotjar.com/legal/policies/privacy/ Cookie _ttp Duration 389 days Description Tracking cookie used by TikTok to identify a visitor Vendor TikTok Privacy Policy https://www.tiktok.com/legal/page/eea/privacy-policy/en?lang=en Cookie zdt40h42t3cb00 Duration Description no_match Vendor Privacy Policy Cookie _ga Duration 2 years Description ID used to identify users Vendor Google Analytics Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacy Cookie _fbp Duration 4 months Description Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers Vendor Facebook Privacy Policy https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/ Cookie _gid Duration 24 hours Description ID used to identify users for 24 hours after last activity Vendor Google Analytics Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacy Cookie _uetsid Duration 30 minutes Description This cookie is used by Bing to determine what ads should be shown that may be relevant to the end user perusing the site. Vendor Bing / Microsoft Privacy Policy https://account.microsoft.com/privacy Cookie _gat*ID* Duration 1 minute Description Used to monitor number of Google Analytics server requests when using Google Tag Manager Vendor Google Analytics Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacy Cookie _dc_gtm_*ID* Duration 1 minute Description Used to monitor number of Google Analytics server requests Vendor Google Analytics Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacy Cookie _ga_*ID* Duration 2 years Description ID used to identify users Vendor Google Analytics Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacy V:8 - Grove SOHO brings tiki bar opens in Tampa | That's So Tampa We use cookies to give you the best experience on our site. Learn more or close to accept. Ã— Skip to content Stories Guides Events Shop About Stories Guides Events Shop About Search Search COMMUNITY PARTNER So Tampa Grove SOHO debuts new tiki bar in South Tampa January 23, 2023 â€¢ By Andrew Harlan Grove SOHO brings wild tiki flavors to Tampa January 23, 2023 â€¢ By Andrew Harlan 843 SHARES Facebook Twitter Itâ€™s alway a party at Grove SOHO. The vibrant energy of the owners is matched by the highly photogenic tropical oasis theyâ€™ve built in South Tampa. Groveâ€™s new tiki bar held its grand opening on January 21. That party included a pig roast and an array of the most Instagrammable, TikTok-able cocktails weâ€™ve ever seen. The drink that clearly stole the show is Joe vs The Volcano, a massive concoction for at least four drinkers served in a specialty glass. Itâ€™s made with light rum, dark rum, house-made orgeat, house made lavender syrup, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Itâ€™s all served with a flaming lime boat. Located at 406 S Howard Ave, Grove is far more than just a cocktail hub. The menu includes light delights such as Szechuan tofu salad, coco veggie noodles with buffalo cauliflower, tropical buffalo pork, and mojo edamame. Diners can also build their own Hawaiian bowls, or order something sweet like the pineapple brioche bread pudding. ADVERTISEMENT Saturnâ€™s Ring: A gin based Tiki cocktail featuring house made orgeat, passion fruit, orange, and lime juices There are a huge number of tropical cocktails to choose from, so weâ€™re just going to list a few that caught our attention: An Ode to Donn: Specialty Glass. Iconic Tiki cocktail made with Bacardi 4 year, Havana Club Anejo, orange liqueur, and fresh citrus juices. Agave Colada: Specialty Glass. A smoky riff on a Pina Colada featuring coconut tequila, mezcal, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. Honolulu Hangover: Help make the pain go away with dark rum, over proof rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and coconut cream. Hawayee 5-0: A 50â€™s classic featuring coconut rum, blue curacao, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Patio Pounder: Peach & rosemary vodka, lemonade, lavender simple syrup, pea flower extract. Extremely crushable. Ghost Ship: Groveâ€™s take on the Fog Cutter, combining rum, gin, brandy, lime juice, orange juice, lavender syrup, and sherry cream. Grove offers two mocktails: a lavender orgeat lemonade, and a nada colada. Keep up with the newest tiki hangout in Tampa on Instagram . What to read next: The Rollinâ€™ Mullet opens in February in Seminole Heights Florida State Fair announces new rides and wild desserts Innings Music Festival takes over Raymond James Stadium Photography museum opening in historic Ybor City Codeboxx transforms Tampa into a major tech hub The Gasparilla Pirate Fest Guide Andrew Harlan A proud Eckerd College graduate, heâ€™s a passionate advocate for independent bookstores and St. Petersburgâ€™s thriving craft coffee scene. When heâ€™s not working, youâ€™ll find him biking the Pinellas Trail, strolling with his dogs, catching a film at Green Light Cinema, or enjoying long runs along the cityâ€™s award-winning waterfront parks. About us - Soho Theatre Skip to content Dean St Walthamstow Digital & On Tour Londonâ€™s most vibrant producer of new theatre, comedy and cabaret. On stage. On tour. Online Dean St Soho Theatre Bar Your visit Access Whatâ€™s on Walthamstow Food & Drink Get Involved Walthamstow News & Stories Whatâ€™s on Digital & On Tour About us Get in touch Jobs Soho Theatre India News Artists & Take Part Become A Member Current Membersâ€™ Offers Shop All shows About us London's most vibrant producer of new theatre, comedy and cabaret. On stage. On tour. Online. Welcome to Soho Theatre, Londonâ€™s most vibrant producer for new theatre, comedy and cabaret. A charity and social enterprise, we are driven by a passion for the work we produce, the artists we work with and the audiences we attract. We own our own home, Soho Theatre in the heart of Londonâ€™s West End. A former Synagogue, we raised funds, purchased and redeveloped it, opening it in March 2000. Today it is one of the capitalâ€™s busiest theatre and comedy venues, with a year-round festival programme and a buzzing bar. Our roots date back to the early 1970s at the Soho Poly Theatre. Small but influential, Soho Poly was radical and relevant, capturing the excitement and innovation of its time. Today our work is wide-ranging, drawing from this fringe heritage, and adding a queer, punk, counter-culture flavour. We champion voices that challenge from outside of the mainstream, and sometimes from within it too. We value entertainment and a great night out. We produce and co-produce new plays, work with associate artists and present the best new emerging theatre companies and comedians. We present the early work of countless UK artists (many who become industry giants), and we present many international artistsâ€™ London debuts. We have a thriving variety of artist and talent development programmes, artists under commission and in development, and two new writing awards including the national Verity Bargate Award for new playwrights. Work extends far beyond our Dean Street home, with a UK and international touring programme and connections. We present shows and scout talent at Edinburgh Festival Fringe and are the UKâ€™s leading presenter of Indian comedians and regularly present work there. We film shows and create our own digital work seen across our social platforms and inflight. Currently we are expanding our team as we have recently opened our exciting new second venue in London, Soho Theatre Walthamstow. A culmination of many years of Sohoâ€™s work, in collaboration with a grassroots local campaign, to save a glorious, 1930s art deco venue with an incredible heritage. Reinvented as a 1,000-capacity venue for world-class comedy, panto, performance and participation â€“ a â€˜local theatre with a national profileâ€™, Soho Theatre Walthamstow opened in May 2025 to great acclaim. Led by a collaborative and diverse senior team and board, Soho Theatre is an exciting place to work with a strong team ethic, fast paced, and with opportunities and intent for staff development and progression.
